title: Technical Support Intern (OJT – Hybrid Role)
details: Provided basic technical support for software installation, configuration, and troubleshooting across Windows and Linux systems. Assisted users with resolving connectivity issues, application errors, and system updates.
Documented support cases and created step-by-step guides for recurring technical issues.
Collaborated with IT and admin teams to ensure smooth onboarding of new users and devices.
Supported remote setup of productivity tools including MS Office, Google Workspace, and communication platforms.

title: Freelance Virtual Support – Multimedia & Brand Design Focus
details: Designed logos, brand kits, and visual assets tailored to client needs, ensuring consistency across platforms.
Created marketing materials including social media graphics, flyers, and presentations using Canva, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
Edited promotional videos and reels using CapCut and Adobe Premiere, optimizing for platform-specific formats.
Scheduled posts and assisted with content planning for Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
Coordinated project timelines, gathered feedback, and delivered revisions promptly via email and messaging platforms.
Organized design assets and client files in Google Drive and Dropbox, ensuring version control and accessibility.
Conducted visual trend research and competitor benchmarking to inform branding strategies.
Managed basic admin tasks including email correspondence, billing records, and milestone tracking.
